page.title: 13Our School Computer
page.content: In our classroom we have a{B.B.C. {Acorn B Computer,}which the{Parent {Teacher Association}bought for us. It cost{Â£300}(but it was worth it!) We have had it for nearly a year but today we are excited because it is the first day we have used the{Disc Drive. The Disc Drive is a great advantage because it loads a lot quicker than a cassette and with a disc you don't have to rewind. We have about{20 games}on disc and it is great! We are also doing the{Domesday Project on disc. Our headmistress learnt how to use it at the {Micros Centre, Perdiswell, {Worcester}so that she could teach us how to use it.
